name: Ski (itch)
description:
Ski

A 4kb ski game for the Commodore 64

Tap tap left and right to steer, button (z key) to jump 

You can jump over logs and water

The longer the jump button is pressed the further you jump7 DirectionsWatch for the position of the next gate indicator at the bottom of the screen

Plan the direction of exiting the current gate based on the position of the next gateNext Gate Position  IndicatorThe game ends if 3 gates are missed or you collide with somethingMisses Try to beat the high score three timesHigh Score Collect S-K-I to reset misses and gain 3 points 

Pickups:
R - Reduce speed
F - Faster 
N - No penalty for collisions or missing gates while flashingPickups
